1370: Hille was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Oderada at age 20 in 1370.
Had a son with Oderada, Eghenonis, at age 20.
1372: Had a daughter with Oderada, Lutghardis, at age 22.
1373: Had a son with Oderada, Geraldus, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Oderada, Lutghardis, at age 25.
1376: Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 2 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Oderada, Gloria, at age 27.
1381: Had a son with Oderada, Abben, at age 31.
1382: Had a son with Oderada, Blankard, at age 32.
1388: Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 17 years old.
1391: Lost son Geraldus when Geraldus was 19 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1395: Lost son Blankard when Blankard was 14 years old.
1396: Lost son Eghenonis when Eghenonis was 27 years old.
